subcategory.name: Page Headings
subcategory.description: Page heading examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS page heading components to add things like page titles, buttons, profile pictures, and useful information to the top of the page. These component examples are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
